'''Millennia of History''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]]. 

Players will find scattered ruins or simulacra near the areas of interest, which can be picked up and placed in the green pads to cause various effects. When a simulacrum is picked up, they will give hints to the player as to where they should be placed.

Restoring all of the ruins grants the {{Achievement|Good as New (Achievement)}}.
